## Research interests and expertise

-  Genitourinary cancers (with prostate cancer focus)
-  Circulating tumour DNA and tissue biomarkers
-  Molecular biology and bioinformatics
-  Integrating translational research into clinical trials
-  Biobanking and database creation

-  2021, Cancer Council Australia Postdoctoral Research Fellowship
